column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////We went to Wildberry's TWICE on our recent trip to Chicago for Lollapalooza. While we had to wait on both occasions being that it was super busy
column2: it was well worth the wait. The pancake selection was tremendous ( we ordered every kind between us) and the hash browns were super tasty. The prices were very reasonable
column3: they had a barista/coffee bar on site and the service was spot on
column4: especially with all the special requests/substitutions that our group had with every meal. Also
column5: even though they had people waiting for tables
column6: they let us sit and chat with our coffees after we had had our meal. It was a great place for breakfast/brunch.
